statements: SELECT * FROM on_chain_data WHERE block_height = 100;
SELECT transaction_hash, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM on_chain_data WHERE sender_address = '0x5A983aE9E81A88637f2db956D56fAB388928aE2C';
SELECT receiver_address, amount, timestamp FROM on_chain_data WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM on_chain_data WHERE receiver_address IN ('0xAc5fC5b1dE47722f21D1A72Fc3c282F13967B3ff', '0x2dd433106Ce79e758d022c599C33d67c53952C81') ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT block_height, transaction_hash, timestamp FROM on_chain_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM on_chain_data ORDER BY block_height DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM on_chain_data WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT block_height, transaction_hash, timestamp FROM on_chain_data WHERE sender_address = '0x123456' AND receiver_address = '0x789abc'
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM on_chain_data
SELECT * FROM on_chain_data WHERE timestamp >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM OnChainData ORDER BY Timestamp DESC
SELECT SenderAddress, ReceiverAddress, Amount FROM OnChainData WHERE Amount > 1000
SELECT BlockNumber, TransactionHash FROM OnChainData WHERE SenderAddress = '0x123456789ABC'
SELECT MAX(MarketCap) AS MaxMarketCap FROM MarketInsights
SELECT MarketPrice, TradingVolume, TrendAnalysis FROM MarketInsights WHERE Timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY MarketPrice ASC
SELECT SenderAddress, ReceiverAddress, Amount FROM OnChainData WHERE BlockNumber = 1000;
SELECT TransactionHash, SenderAddress, ReceiverAddress, Amount FROM OnChainData WHERE BlockNumber > 500 AND BlockNumber < 1000 ORDER BY Amount DESC;
SELECT SenderAddress, ReceiverAddress, Amount, Timestamp FROM OnChainData WHERE SenderAddress LIKE '0x%' ORDER BY Timestamp ASC;
SELECT MarketPrice, TradingVolume, ActiveAddresses FROM MarketInsights WHERE Timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM OnChainData INNER JOIN MarketInsights ON OnChainData.Timestamp = MarketInsights.Timestamp WHERE OnChainData.Amount > 100000 ORDER BY OnChainData.Timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions;
SELECT id, tx_hash, amount FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT block_number, timestamp FROM Blocks ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT address, balance FROM Addresses WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT from_address, to_address, amount FROM Transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 10000 ORDER BY from_address DESC
SELECT id, tx_hash, amount FROM Transactions WHERE block_number = 1000
SELECT * FROM Blocks WHERE num_transactions > 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT from_address, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Transactions GROUP BY from_address
SELECT address, balance FROM Addresses WHERE balance < 0.0 ORDER BY balance ASC
SELECT * FROM on_chain_data ORDER BY block_number DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT sender_address FROM on_chain_data;
SELECT receiver_address, amount FROM on_chain_data WHERE block_number = 1000;
SELECT * FROM market_insights ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM on_chain_data WHERE amount > 10000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE sender_address = '0x123456789' AND receiver_address = '0x987654321' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT sender_address FROM on_chain_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY sender_address;
SELECT block_number, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM on_chain_data WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 week' ORDER BY block_number;
SELECT address, identity FROM address_mapping WHERE identity ILIKE 'Company%' ORDER BY address ASC;
SELECT * FROM on_chain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, block_number, timestamp FROM on_chain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT from_address, to_address, amount FROM on_chain_transactions WHERE block_number = 1000;
SELECT * FROM blocks ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT token_id, token_name, symbol FROM tokens WHERE total_supply > 100000;
SELECT * FROM on_chain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, block_number, timestamp FROM on_chain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT token_name, symbol, total_supply FROM tokens WHERE total_supply > 1000000;
SELECT address, balance FROM addresses WHERE created_at > '2023-01-01';
SELECT t.token_name, tt.amount, a.balance FROM token_transactions tt JOIN tokens t ON tt.token_id = t.token_id JOIN addresses a ON tt.from_address = a.address WHERE tt.amount > 1000;
